text: Thierry Gouvenou (born 14 May 1969) is a French former professional racing cyclist. He rode in seven editions of the Tour de France and one each of the Vuelta a España and the Giro d'Italia. Since 2014, Gouvenou has worked as a lead course designer of the Tour de France. ==Career achievements== ===Major results=== ;1990 : 1st Paris–Roubaix Espoirs ;1991 : 9th Omloop Het Volk ;1992 : 10th Overall Etoile de Bessèges ;1993 : 10th Omloop Het Volk ;1994 : 10th Kuurne–Brussels–Kuurne ;1995 : 3rd GP de Denain ;1997 : 7th Overall Tour de Normandie ;1998 : 3rd Overall Tour de Normandie ::1st Stage 4 ;1999 : 3rd Overall Tour de Normandie : 10th GP de la Ville de Rennes ;2001 : 10th Tro-Bro Léon ;2002 : 3rd Polynormande : 7th Paris–Roubaix : 10th Paris–Camembert ===Grand Tour general classification results timeline=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" |- !
